name: Collision Pilot
description:
Features:

  • It's very easy to play.
  • Move around the scrren - drag and drop - ( left, right, up and down ).
  • Pilot mode. Target: You should get the flags that you ask at each level. 6 levels with increasing difficulty and get your gold, silver or bronze medal.
  • Visual effects.
  • Catchy music.
  • Shield to Player.
  • Different types of time-extra, speed, bomb, increases / decreases in size, magnetic fields, death loop, arrow of death and more.
